activities: Personal information collected in questionnaires is used on your behalf by our staff to prepare and submit petitions, applications and supporting documents to government agencies for the purpose of your immigrant and non-immigrant benefits. All VISANOW accounts are kept separate from one another and require secure authentication to access personal information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, including online, offline, human resource, and manually processed data
privacyprograms: Self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: EU and Swiss data protection authorities
